participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is reflective and thoughtful, often lost in his imagination. He has a strong connection to music and literature, using them as outlets for his emotions.
participant_1.background: I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football. I am a deaf man. I read fantasy novels to escape my reality. I play music to cheer myself up. I love to eat shrimp and lobster.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is creative and ambitious, always looking for new ways to express herself through music. She values personal connections and enjoys sharing her talents with others.
participant_2.background: I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends. I have a box of letters from my parents that I keep safe. I am a software engineer who prides myself on finding the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular. I don't have any social media presence because my time is focused on my music. He worked hard.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
That's great to hear! What are your hobbies?
I like to play the guitar, write music, and play video games.
That's awesome! I love to read fantasy novels and play music as well.
Oh cool! What's your favorite fantasy novel?
I don't have a single favorite, but I really love the Kingkiller Chronicle series by Patrick Rothfuss.
Oh, I've heard good things about that series! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really great series.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I mostly play guitar and sing. I like to play a variety of genres, but I'm mostly into indie rock and folk music.
That's awesome! I love playing guitar and singing too. I'm mostly into pop and rock music.
Cool! We should start a band together!
That would be so much fun!
Great! We can start practicing right away!
